tool_description: Creates follow-up schedules and reminder systems for email correspondence to ensure timely responses and maintain communication momentum.

original_email_subject.description: Subject line of the original email

email_priority.description: Priority level: low, medium, high, urgent

follow_up_sequence.description: Days after sending for each follow-up (e.g., [3, 7, 14])

error_messages: Invalid priority level: Use one of [low, medium, high, urgent]
Invalid response time: Expected response days must be between 1-30
Invalid follow-up sequence: Days must be positive integers in ascending order
Empty subject line: Provide the original email subject
Invalid email format: Provide a valid recipient email address
usage: Input original_email_subject, recipient_email, and email_priority. Optionally customize expected_response_days and follow_up_sequence. The tool creates a structured follow-up plan.

follow_up_templates.description: Suggested follow-up email templates for each stage

tracking_id.description: Unique identifier for this follow-up sequence
